gov.nih.nlm.nls.lvg.Db

Class DbDerivation

  • java.lang.Object
    • gov.nih.nlm.nls.lvg.Db.DbDerivation

  • public class DbDerivation
extends java.lang.Object
    This class provides high level interfaces to derivation table in LVG database.

    History:

    • SCR-15, chlu, 07-23-12, add derivation type options.
    • SCR-20, chlu, 07-23-12, add derivation negation options.
    Version:
    V-2013
    Author:
    NLM NLS Development Team
    See Also:
    DerivationRecord, Desgin Document

    • Method Detail

      • GetDerivations

        public static java.util.Vector<DerivationRecord> GetDerivations(java.lang.String inStr,
                                                                java.sql.Connection conn,
                                                                int typeFlag,
                                                                int negationFlag)
                                                         throws java.sql.SQLException
        Get derivation records for a specific term (lower case) from LVG database. Two SQL queries are performed to get bi-directional search: one uses termLc1 as key, one uses termLc2 as key.
        Parameters:
        inStr - term for derivations (lower case)
        conn - database connection
        typeFlag - type flag: 0 (Z), 1 (P), 2(S), 3(ZP), 4 (ZS), 5 (PS), 6 (ZPS)
        negationFlag - negation tag: N|O
        Returns:
        all derivation records for the specified term, inStr, with option
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - if there is a database error happens

      • GetDerivations

        public static java.util.Vector<DerivationRecord> GetDerivations(java.lang.String inStr,
                                                                java.sql.Connection conn)
                                                         throws java.sql.SQLException
        Get derivation records for a specific term (lower case) from LVG database. Two SQL queries are performed to get bi-directional search: one uses termLc1 as key, one uses termLc2 as key.
        Parameters:
        inStr - term for derivations (lower case)
        conn - database connection
        Returns:
        all non-negative derivation records for the specified term, inStr
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - if there is a database error happens

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
        Test driver for this class.
